code: import React from'react';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';var LakeShowPage=function LakeShowPage(props){var lake=useSelector(function(state){return state.lakeReducer.currentLake;});return React.createElement("div",{style:{textAlign:'center',margin:'10vh'}},React.createElement("h1",null,lake.name),React.createElement("img",{alt:"lake",src:lake.images[0]}),React.createElement("p",null,lake.description));};export default LakeShowPage;
